title: Jamie: a behavioural approach to family intervention (TEFC)
creator_credit: J Loebsen and University of California, Los Angeles. Media Center
brief_description: Jamie is a pre-school child whose behaviour problems disturb his family life. Jamies’ parents discuss with a therapist their response to Jamie’s behaviour and the benefits of the classes they attend, which provide a program to modify both Jamie’s actions and his parents attitude to his behaviour.
